label: Serverless Information Tracker
tag line: SIT enables decentralized, sporadically connected parties to contribute and process shared information
Description1: SIT is a compact tool that helps tracking and sharing information between people and systems in a decentralized, sporadically-online environment (aka "the real world") -- with or without Internet
Description2: SIT is about finding ways to build communication and collaboration tools of the post-cloud era and for environments where there's no "online" -- for whatever kind of reason.
description:
#SIT enables decentralized, sporadically connected parties to contribute and process shared information
##About Serverless Information Tracker
![About Serverless Information Tracker]()
 ###SIT is a compact tool that helps tracking and sharing information between people and systems in a decentralized, sporadically-online environment (aka "the real world") -- with or without Internet
SIT is about finding ways to build communication and collaboration tools of the post-cloud era and for environments where there's no "online" -- for whatever kind of reason.
